/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern buildings, their facades adorned with glass windows that reflect the clear blue sky. Cars of various colors are parked neatly along the side of the road, hinting at the city's vibrant transportation system. The sky above is a serene blue, dotted with a few wispy clouds, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. The image is taken from a low angle, which enhances the grandeur of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle.
